dev.model

Class GameObject.ObservableGameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • dev.model.GameObject.ObservableGameObject
  • Enclosing class:
    GameObject

    protected class GameObject.ObservableGameObject
extends java.util.Observable
    ObservableGameObject Description: this class extends the functionality of being an Observable, which, as an instance, gives GameObjects a property of being observed.

    A. Burak Sahin
